name: Mr. Shifty
description: Teleport, shift through bullets, and master lightning-fast takedowns in an all new kind of action game from tinyBuild and Team Shifty!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 GTX / AMD Radeon 7850 HD series card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
